H0.text: uruguay is located along what body of water. Atlantic Ocean

H1.text: uruguay is located along what body of water. Rio de la Plata

H2.text: uruguay is located along what body of water. South Atlantic Ocean

H3.text: uruguay is located along what body of water. Bay of Montevideo

A4.text: Uruguay ... bordering the Río de la Plata to the south and the Atlantic Ocean to the southeast.

A5.text: The Río de la Plata forms part of the border between Argentina and Uruguay.

A6.text: The Río de la Plata empties into the Atlantic Ocean.

A7.text: The Bay of Montevideo is located in Uruguay
